                "param(\n    [ValidateScript({\n        $AnHourAgo = (Get-Date).AddHours(-1)\n        if ($_ -lt $AnHourAgo.AddMinutes(5) -and $_ -gt $AnHourAgo.AddMinutes(-5)) {\n            $true\n        } else {\n            throw \"That's not within five minutes. Try again.\"\n        }\n    })]\n    [String]$TimeAboutAnHourAgo\n)"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "type": "code",
